name: Again? (itch)
description:
You fell asleep after a long night's work of crunch to make your new RPG, now suddenly you've awoken with a new squishy, jelly body that looks nothing like the way you used to. Now you have to find the secrets of why this happened to YOU and why you are stuck in this seemingly infinite loop.

Use W,A,S,D to move around

Use Space to jump and hold to jump higher

This project was done on a very small time scale and was done in only my spare time so sadly a lot of the features that I wanted such as enemys and some other platformer feature had to be cut as I did all of the art by my self and this entire project was done from scratch in unity by me.

Thank you for coming to play!  : )
